pr_title: Use OpenAPI examples to generate Values in Requests on behalf of SDA SE

timeline.bodyText: This should be done before instantiating the above StringBuilder.
timeline.author: thc202

replies.bodyText: I've now remove the StringBuilder completely (as suggested by IntelliJ) as it unnecessary. (413785c)
replies.author: J12934

timeline.bodyText: The exception (at least the message) should be included.
timeline.author: thc202
thc202

timeline.bodyText: This seems unnecessary, the getter can be called directly like in BodyGenerator.
timeline.author: thc202

timeline.bodyText: I'd suggest reverting this, it avoids generating a value when not needed (header parameters).
timeline.author: thc202

timeline.bodyText: Better remove the example fields than change the tests, these should not test the example logic.
timeline.author: thc202
thc202

replies.bodyText:
Did you mean Request instead of Schema?
I've renamed the Method to ...InRequest which is more fitting 👍
replies.author: J12934

replies.bodyText: I thought that was referring to where the examples were (following tests are named like that), not where they will be used(?). Technically they are all in the request so seems redundant.
replies.author: thc202

replies.bodyText: Oh yeah that a good point. Removed the part.
replies.author: J12934

timeline.author: thc202

timeline.message: Use OpenAPI 3 example in URL Path & Query
Duplicate PetStore OpenAPI Spec to add example to
Add example values to OpenAPI Spec

Add test to check behaviour of crawler for OpenAPI Specs using examples

This test is a bit different to the others in the test file,
as these use the same assertion helper function which asserts
that **ALL** the urls are right.
This doesn't really work here as the point of the test is that
the urls are supposed to be different.
Formatting fix
Use example from object schema as values
Update PetStore test which contains an example property
Use example value in complex form data string
Add expected response for OpenAPI v2 Test
Update Expected Response in Abstract Test Class
Add test case for examples in arrays
Allow to specify full examples for arrays
Update comments in Example OpenAPI Specs
Remove unnecessary StringBuilder
Include exception in warning log
Inline get and has example methods
Move value generation one level lower
Remove example from general OpenAPI tests
Add for OpenAPI 2.0 using x-example attributes
Clarify method name
Remove forgotten debug log
Add note to changelog
Remove redundant part from test name
Add SDA SE to OpenAPI Extension Author List
Add SDA SE to OpenAPI Extension Author List

Use Oxford Comma

Co-authored-by: kingthorin <kingthorin@users.noreply.github.com>
